```javascript
const allPizzas = ['margherita', 'pepperoni', 'margherita', 'vegetarian', 'ham','pepperoni']

const numberOfItems = 2

// Get first items
const first = allPizzas.slice(0,numberOfItems) // ["margherita","pepperoni"]

// Get last items (negative value)
const last = allPizzas.slice(-numberOfItems) // ["ham","pepperoni"]
```
title: Javascript: Select Multiple Array Values From Beginning Or End
